class Solution {    public int minCostClimbingStairs(int[] cost) {        int len = cost.length;        if(len==2)            return(Math.min(cost[0], cost[1]));        int[] result = new int[len];        result[0]=cost[0];        result[1]=cost[1];        for(int i=2; i<len; i++){            result[i] = Math.min(result[i-1], result[i-2])+cost[i];         }        // noted        return Math.min(result[len-2], result[len-1]);    }}`
